statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.description: Shawn Prudhomme scored 28 points and Adrian Rodgers 25 to lead Southern University to an 84-79 victory over Southwestern Athletic Conference champion Texas Southern on Thursday night.
article.headline: Southern University knocks off Texas Southern 84-79
article.linkText: Southern University knocks off Texas Southern 84-79
article.story: BATON ROUGE, La. -- Shawn Prudhomme scored 28 points and Adrian Rodgers 25 to lead Southern University to an 84-79 victory over Southwestern Athletic Conference champion Texas Southern on Thursday night. Trelun Banks added 11 points and Christopher Hyder had nine assists for Southern (19-11, 11-6), who are in fourth place, a game back of Jackson State, with one game remaining. Southern shot 56 percent. Chris Thomas scored 22 points, grabbed 10 rebounds and had nine assists for Texas Southern (16-13, 15-2). Malcolm Riley had five 3-pointers and 21 points, Jose Rodriguez 12 points and Derrick Griffin 13 rebounds for the Tigers, who already clinched the regular-season title with a victory over Alabama State on Monday. Texas Southern rallied from a 10-point second-half deficit to get within three with 21 seconds left but Rodgers hit the front-end of two trips to the line while Thomas missed a 3-pointer with 12 seconds left.
